description:
OmaKanta-sovelluksessa näet reseptitietosi ajasta ja paikasta riippumatta. Kirjaudu helposti, lähetä pyyntö reseptin uusimisesta ja tilaa ilmoitukset uusituista resepteistä. Sovellukseen lisätään toimintoja vaiheittain. 

Tarkempaa tietoa OmaKanta-sovelluksesta: 

OmaKanta-sovelluksessa 
- katselet reseptejäsi ja uusit ne 
- tilaat ilmoitukset uusista ja uusituista resepteistä 
- kirjaudut sisään helposti ja turvallisesti itse valitsemallasi tunnusluvulla tai sormenjälki- tai kasvojentunnistuksella. 

  
OmaKanta-sovellukseen on tulossa myös toiminnot, joilla voit  
- katsella lääkärin ja hoitajan kirjauksia 
- tutustua laboratoriotutkimusten tuloksiin 
- tilata ilmoitukset uusista laboratoriotutkimuspyynnöistä ja -tuloksista 
- tilata ilmoitukset uusista lääkärin ja hoitajan kirjauksista. 

Kaikki OmaKannan toiminnot ovat käytössäsi jo nyt OmaKanta-verkkopalvelussa, jonne voit kirjautua osoitteessa www.kanta.fi.

Ota käyttöösi uudistettu Yliopiston Apteekin mobiilisovellus!

Lataa sovellus puhelimeesi ja rekisteröidy! Sen jälkeen voit hoitaa apteekkiasiointisi mistä ikinä haluat! Sovellusta käyttämällä olet vain parin näppäilyn päässä palveluistamme ja kaikista kanta-asiakkuuden eduista ja hyödyistä.

Sovellus sisältää sähköisen kanta-asiakaskorttisi, jonka voit skannata apteekissa asioidessasi niin reseptitiskillä kuin kassalla. Sovelluksen kautta voit myös kätevästi avata chat-yhteyden joko farmaseutin tai kosmetologin kanssa, saada neuvontaa ja tilata haluamasi reseptilääkkeet ja muut tuotteet hyvinvointiisi verkkokaupastamme. Yliopiston Apteekin kanta-asiakkaana saat kuukausittain lukuisia rahanarvoisia etuja ja terveyttäsi edistäviä palveluita.

Maksuton sovellus sisältää seuraavat ominaisuudet:

Sähköinen kanta-asiakaskortti:
- Todenna kanta-asiakkuutesi näyttämällä sähköisen asiakaskorttisi QR-koodi reseptitiskillä ja kassalla.

Edut:
- Omat edut -osiosta löydät omat etukuponkisi, joilla saat vaihtuvia alennuksia ja etuja joka kuukausi.

Kampanjat:
- Tiedot kaikista kampanjoistamme, kanta-asiakastarjouksista ja alennustuotteista.

Chat:
- Tavoitat farmaseutin ja kosmetologin joka päivä klo 8 – 22 maksuttomassa chatissamme, jonka löydät helposti sovelluksen oikean alareunan puhekuplasta.

Asiakastili:
- Vasemman yläkulman symbolia painamalla avaat oman asiakastilisi, mistä löydät omien kanta-asiakastietojesi lisäksi ostojesi kuittitiedot sekä viestintävalintasi, joita voit ylläpitää toiveesi mukaan. Täällä voit myös valita omat kiinnostuksenkohteesi, joiden perusteella voimme lähettää sinulle sinua eniten kiinnostavat edut, tarjoukset ja viestit.
- Asiakastilin asetuksista voit laittaa sovelluksen hälytykset eli notifikaatiot päälle tai pois sekä valita sinulle kätevimmän tunnistautumistavan sovelluksen avaamiseksi.

Palvelut: 
- Tästä osiosta löydät käteviä lääkehoitoasi ja apteekkiasiointiasi helpottavia palveluita, kuten laskurit, joilla voit laskea lääkkeidesi toimitusvälin ja Kela-korvattavuuden. Muistuttajan avulla saat aina tiedon, kun voit seuraavan kerran ostaa lääkkeesi Kela-korvattuna. Voit myös asettaa hälytyksen muistuttamaan sinua lääkkeen ottamisesta oikeaan aikaan. Voit tilata myös yhteenvedon aiemmista reseptilääkeostoistasi kätevästi tätä kautta.

Kauppa:
- Tästä pääset suoraan Yliopiston Apteekin verkkokauppaan selaamaan tuotetietoja ja tekemään ostoja. Sovellusta käyttäessäsi olet automaattisesti tunnistautunut ja kirjautunut ostaaksesi esim. reseptilääkkeitä kätevästi.

Yhteystiedot:
- Löydät lähimmän Yliopiston Apteekin vaivattomasti ja yhteystiedot kaikkiin muihinkin toimipisteisiimme.

Yliopiston Apteekin kanta-asiakasohjelman ehdot:
https://www.yliopistonapteekki.fi/kanta-asiakkuus/ehdot

Yliopiston Apteekin tietosuojaseloste:
https://www.yliopistonapteekki.fi/rekisteriselosteet

The Maisa mobile app brings public social care and health care services directly to your phone. You can now manage your and your family's health care and social care anywhere, anytime. Exchange messages with your care team, access your medical and social care records, view your test results and manage your appointments.

The Maisa portal allows you to
• ask for advice or ask to be contacted
• review and supplement your social care and health care information
• view tests results
• book and cancel appointments
• fill in questionnaires prior to your appointment
• upload self-monitoring results from apps such as Apple Health
• connect with a provider through a video appointment
• arrive yourself for a scheduled appointment using the Appointment Arrival feature. Please note that with your permission this feature may use your device’s location in the background.

The Maisa application is available in Finnish, Swedish and English. Maisa is used in the services of HUS Helsinki University Hospital, the city of Helsinki and in the services of Vantaa and Kerava wellbeing services counties as well as Kauniainen (as part of the Western Uusimaa wellbeing services county).

Preglife – Scandinavia’s Leading Pregnancy App

Preglife is the all-in-one app for those who are pregnant, preparing for birth, or have recently become a parent. We offer trusted, evidence-based information from midwives and medical specialists – tailored to each week of your pregnancy and your baby’s early development. Our goal: to be your midwife in your pocket.

► Pregnancy calendar – Track your journey week by week
► Articles with in-depth info on your baby’s growth, nutrition, and pregnancy health
► 3 expert-led podcasts on childbirth and parenting
► Personalized insights for every stage of pregnancy
► Guides on breastfeeding, car seats, insurance, vaccinations, and more

All content is reviewed by an international network of midwives and medical professionals.

During Pregnancy:
► Contraction timer
► Smart checklist for everything you need
► Vaccination guide – Know what’s recommended and what’s free
► Free online birth preparation course (in Swedish and English)

Partner section:
Tips and support for your partner – including shared activities before and after birth.

Mumfulness – Mind & Body Wellness
Choose from expert-led yoga, workouts, and guided meditations to support your well-being throughout pregnancy and early parenthood.

Preglife is Scandinavia’s leading pregnancy app with over 9 million downloads and top ratings on the App Store!
Download Preglife today for a confident, informed, and personalized pregnancy journey.

Contact us: info@preglife.com

Follow us:
Instagram: instagram.com/preglife
Facebook: facebook.com/preglife

Privacy policy & terms of use:
https://preglife.com/privacy-policy
https://preglife.com/user-agreement

Fimlab mobile application for receiving and viewing laboratory test results.



The Fimlab mobile application allows you to receive certain laboratory test results and view your results from the past three years. The Fimlab mobile application is currently available to Fimlab customers in Pirkanmaa, Kanta-Häme and Central Finland. The application is secure to use: it requires strong authentication. Please note that authentication is only possible if you use a Finnish operator.



In the application, you can:
- receive results of specific laboratory examinations carried out by Fimlab (currently only available to customers in Pirkanmaa, Kanta-Häme and Central Finland)
- view your test results from the past three years
- access Fimlab’s online booking system
- find the contact details for Fimlab’s customer service



More information: https://fimlab.fi/en/this-is-how-you-get-the-results/fimlab-mobile-application/
Privacy Policy: https://fimlab.fi/yritys/tietosuoja/fimlab-mobiilisovelluksen-tietosuojakaytanto#en

Do what over a million parents have done. Download the pregnancy app Preggers and check out the world's best 3-D experience of child development and growth.

"Preggers offers the most medically correct, lifelike animations of child development during pregnancy that I've ever seen."
– Eeva Itkonen, certified midwife

► Download Preggers | Pregnancy & Baby - today◄

Baby tracker with an amazing 3-D experience
→ Track the baby development with a unique 3-D experience, because all children are different.
→ Follow the baby growth - from an unfertilised egg to a fully developed baby
→ Get information and highlights from the development of your child
→ Use the baby size tracker and see your child's actual size – zoom and rotate to see all the details

Pregnancy tracker with useful and fun information
→ Pregnancy calendar - even for you with a twin pregnancy, if you will have a caesarean section or have a planned induction
→ Baby size tracker - the baby size is visualised week by week with interactive and cute fruits, animals, and other things
→ Pregnancy week by week information on all the amazing changes that are happening
→ Articles and information written by experts from different fields
→ Subscribe to trending podcasts about pregnancy, children and parenthood

Functions & Tools
→ Get help calculating the first, preliminary pregnancy due date
→ Share your pregnancy calendar and smart tools with loved ones
→ Dark theme (perfect for restless legs and nighttime reading) and other colour themes for a more personal experience
→ Custom exercises before, during, and after the pregnancy, created by experts
→ Search from thousands of baby names in our baby name generator, and see what the trending names for the current year are
→ Smart checklist and baby list with everything that you need for your new family member
→ Kegel exercises that are simple and fun to do - we promise!
→ Pregnancy food guide & Breastfeeding food guide, to make quick everyday decisions easier

Immortalise your personal journey
→ Baby milestones - a diary where you can save all your thoughts, memories, and photos
→ Bump Booth – a photo function with cute stickers for the bump and baby
→ Share your pregnancy countdown and baby progress on social media

Only available in the Preggers app
→ Unique 3-D experience with the development of your child and information about your pregnancy
→ Information about the pregnant body, illustrated with a unique 3-D experience
→ Stats even for those with caesarean section and planned induction
→ Animated, interactive size comparisons, shown with cute fruits, animals, and other items
→ In the diary, every entry has information about the week of pregnancy or the age of your child, so you can easily look back on your memories
→ Create memories in your child's diary together with your loved ones
→ Trending names for the current year and the option to share with your loved ones
→ Beautiful design, dark mode, and different coloured themes for a more personal experience
→ Price comparison function that helps you find the best price – available in select countries
→ Exclusive information for everything you need to acquire

Information in the Preggers app
Preggers guides you through your pregnancy and the toddler years and shows you relevant information for your current week or your child's age. You can feel safe and secure knowing that the contents of the app have been produced in collaboration with experts on pregnancy, children, exercise, and more. The app is updated continuously to make the greatest adventure of your life a bit easier, and to contribute to a good start for the whole family.

► Download Preggers | Pregnancy & Baby - today◄

*** Most downloaded Contraction Timer app in the world! Number 1 in the UK, USA, Australia, Canada, Italy and elsewhere! ***

This is the simplest-to-use contraction timer. The app will help to track your contractions and determine when it's time to go to the hospital.
If you plan on having a home birth, the app will tell you what stage of labor you are in at any given moment.

Keep track of your labor by tapping a single button at the start and at the end of each contraction. The Contraction Timer analyzes the duration and frequency of contractions and will notify you when it's time to go to the hospital.

Thousands of pregnant women around the world have become mothers using our app.

Always consult your doctor to orient yourself in terms of contraction frequency and duration.
This app is not a medical device and our recomendations are based on standard indicators. Your labor may occur differently. Therefore, do not rely exclusively on our app.
If the duration and frequency of contractions do not yet correspond to the necessary indicators but labor pains become unbearable, it is better to go to the hospital as soon as possible rather than give birth at home or on the way there. Trust what your body is telling you.

If you have any questions or suggestions, please email us at neumandev@gmail.com. Your feedback is very important to us.

Huckleberry is your all-in-one parenting partner, proudly trusted by 5+ million families worldwide. 

From baby tracker to personalized guidance, our award-winning app helps you navigate sleep, feeding, milestones, and everything in between. Backed by a team of pediatric experts and powered by smart tools, Huckleberry supports each family’s unique journey. We turn restless nights into restful routines, making more space for everyday magic.

TRUSTED SLEEP GUIDANCE & TRACKING

Your baby's sleep and daily rhythms are unique. Our comprehensive baby tracker helps you understand their natural patterns while providing expert sleep guidance every step of the way. From breastfeeding to nappies, our newborn tracker gives you peace of mind in those early days and beyond.

SWEETSPOT®: YOUR SLEEP TIMING COMPANION

A most-loved feature that predicts your baby's ideal nap times with remarkable accuracy. No more guessing about sleep windows or watching for tired cues—SweetSpot® learns your child's unique rhythms to suggest optimal sleep times. Available with Plus and Premium memberships.

BERRY: 24/7 PARENTING GUIDANCE 

Instant parenting backup that adapts to what you need, when you need it. Using expert-vetted and AI-powered guidance, Berry can work through the messiness of parenting with you. You can solve challenges, get reassurance, and easily track multiple things at once—all in one AI chat. No matter the moment or mood, you always have backup.

FREE APP FEATURES

• Simple, one-touch baby tracker for sleep, nappy changes, feedings, pumping, growth, potty training, activities and medicine
• Complete breastfeeding timer with tracking for both sides
• Sleep summaries and history, plus average sleep totals
• Track multiple children with individual profiles
• Reminders when it’s time for medication, feedings, and more
• Sync with multiple caregivers across different devices

PLUS MEMBERSHIP

• All free features, and:
• SweetSpot®:  Predicts the ideal time for sleep (2+ months)
• Schedule Creator: Plan age-appropriate sleep schedules
• Insights: Data-driven tips and miniplans for sleep, feedings, and milestones (0-17 months)
• Enhanced Reports: Discover your child’s trends
• AI Logging: Track your child’s day through text, voice message, or photo

PREMIUM MEMBERSHIP

• Everything in Plus, and:
• Berry: 24/7 guidance with our expert-vetted AI chat
• Custom Sleep Plans: expert-designed plans built for your child, with weekly progress check-ins and ongoing support as they grow 

GENTLE, EVIDENCE-BASED APPROACH

Our sleep guidance never requires "crying it out." Instead, we blend trusted sleep science with gentle, family-centered solutions that respect your parenting style. Every recommendation is made for your family's needs and comfort level.

PERSONALIZED PARENTING SUPPORT

• Expert newborn tracker tools and analytics
• Get custom sleep schedules based on your baby's age and patterns
• Science-backed guidance for common sleep challenges
• Navigate sleep regressions with confidence
• Receive timely recommendations as your baby grows
• Help your newborn develop healthy sleep habits from day one

AWARD-WINNING RESULTS

The Huckleberry baby tracker app ranked #1 in the iOS medical category globally. Today, we help families across 179 countries achieve better sleep. Up to 93% of families using our baby sleep tracking report improved sleep patterns.

Whether you're navigating newborn sleep, infant solids or toddler milestones, Huckleberry provides the tools and guidance your family needs to flourish.

Terms of Use: https://www.huckleberrycare.com/terms-of-use
Privacy Policy: https://www.huckleberrycare.com/privacy-policy

Take charge of your sleep therapy success with myAir™, an exclusive app available to Resmed AirSense™ and AirCurve™ users.

GUIDED SETUP

Whether you set up your equipment at home or in person, myAir helps you get started with confidence and ease. The Personal Therapy Assistant* feature provides interactive voice-guided instructions to help you set up your equipment and fit your mask. myAir's Test Drive* feature helps you get comfortable with therapy using your machine at different levels of air pressure. The app also offers a Library of helpful videos and guides that show you how to set up your specific AirSense or AirCurve machine and Resmed mask, as well as how to get comfortable on therapy.

PERSONALISED SUPPORT

Getting used to therapy can take a little time, but with the right support you can enjoy a great night's sleep. myAir acts like your personal sleep coach. It guides you through therapy and connects you to the support you need, when you need it.

myAir offers tailored coaching, tips and videos to increase your comfort and success. For example, if you have problems with your mask seal, myAir will provide tips about how to fix it. The app also offers a full Library of helpful videos and guides to answer common questions.

Along the way, you'll get email and push notifications that encourage and support you. With regular check-ins*, myAir proactively prompts you to see how your therapy is going and provides coaching if you have problems. With your prior consent, myAir also shares your therapy insights with your healthcare team* so they can be more connected to your care.

SLEEP THERAPY TRACKING

With myAir, you can easily access your daily sleep therapy data to monitor your therapy progress. Simply log in to see your nightly myAir score, which shows how well you slept on therapy at a glance. Detailed metrics help you track your therapy progress over time. You can also download a therapy summary report to keep for your records or share with your healthcare provider.

INTEGRATED WITH HEALTH APPLICATIONS 

myAir integrates with Apple Health and Health Connect to display the health data you track alongside your Resmed therapy data.

Learn more at Resmed.com/myAir.

*Feature available only with an AirSense 11 machine. Not available with AirSense 10 or AirCurve 10. 

Note: myAir is available only for Resmed AirSense and AirCurve machines with built-in wireless connectivity. For the AirMini™ machine, please download the AirMini by Resmed app.

Always seek the advice of a physician or other qualified health provider with any questions you may have regarding a medical condition. If you think you are experiencing a medical emergency, seek immediate medical attention.

In the Päijät-Sote application you can access the primary healthcare services of the wellbeing services county of Päijät-Häme. 
 
You can access the services via safe suomi.fi authentication.
You can easily see your upcoming appointments in Päijät-Sote primary healthcare and access your patient records. You can also improve your wellbeing via an open video library and get tips and support for e.g. mental wellbeing.
 
We further improve and develop our digital services together with our customers and professionals so that we can offer even better services in the future. The available services may vary occasionally in the municipalities in the wellbeing service county district.

SPEAK WITH AN EXPERIENCED VET DIRECTLY ON YOUR MOBILE
At FirstVet, you can always speak with an experienced vet, no matter where you are. FirstVet is a convenient, reliable service when you are unsure whether a visit to the veterinary clinic is needed. We’re here to deal with all of your non-emergency questions and concerns.

Maybe you’re wondering why your cat has suddenly lost their appetite. Why does your dog vomit or have diarrhoea? Or how to best clean a wound on your horse? We’re here to help.

- Unlimited vet video appointments with selected pet insurance policies
- Open 7 days a week
- Get advice or a referral if needed

BE PREPARED – ADD YOUR PET NOW
By downloading the app and adding your pet in advance, you can quickly get help when needed. Signing up is completely free and takes less than a minute.

VIDEO CALLS COVERED BY MAJOR PET INSURANCES
Online visits through FirstVet are included free of charge with over 20 well-known pet insurances and pet care companies in the UK. If you're not registered with one of our partners, regular prices apply. Check our terms and conditions at firstvet.com/uk.

WHAT WE CAN HELP YOU WITH
All of our vets are UK registered and have 3+ years of experience. Here are some examples of what our vets can help your pet with:

- Vomiting and diarrhoea
- Eye and ear problems
- Poisons
- Itching and skin problems
- Coughing and sneezing
- Ticks for dogs and cats
- Injuries and accidents
- Behavioral problems
- Dental care
- Rehabilitation and wellness
- Healthcare advice for horses

VISIT OUR PET SHOP
At firstvet.com/uk, you'll find the highest quality products that have been vet selected and pet approved.

Agria-sovelluksessa (aiemmin Vet Guide) saat eläinlääkärin apua ajasta tai paikasta riippumatta.

 - Avoinna joka päivä klo 7-24
 - Maksuton Agria Eläinvakuutuksen asiakkaille

Lataa Agria-sovellus ja rekisteröidy käyttäjäksi jo tänään, jotta voit tarvittaessa ottaa yhteyttä eläinlääkäriin helposti ja nopeasti. Saat eläinlääkärin neuvontaa ja ensiarvion lemmikin sairauden tai tapaturman oireista.

Agria-sovellus auttaa sinua, jos olet huolissasi lemmikkisi voinnista tai lemmikillä on sairauden tai tapaturman oireita. Eläinlääkäripalvelu on avoinna joka päivä klo 7-24. Agria Eläinvakuutuksen asiakkaana saat käyttää eläinlääkärineuvontaa maksutta. Muut lemmikinomistajat voivat käyttää eläinlääkäripalveluamme maksua vastaan.

Lataa sovellus, rekisteröidy pankkitunnuksilla ja varaa aika eläinlääkärille – helppoa! 

 Eläinlääkärineuvonnasta voit saada apua mm. seuraaviin lemmikin oireisiin: 
- Oksentelu ja ripuli
- Kutina ja ihovaivat
- Silmä- ja korvavaivat
- Yskä ja aivastelu
- Myrkytyksen oireet
- Lievät tapaturmat
- Kissojen käyttäytymisneuvonta (maksullinen palvelu)

Mobiiliapuri -sovellus tarjoaa käyttäjälleen kaiken tiedon hoitoon liittyen helposti ymmärrettävässä muodossa. Aikajanalta potilas voi nähdä hoitoonsa liittyviä tapahtumia ja tehtäviä ja kuitata ne suoritetuiksi.

TaysPolku on mobiilisovellus potilaille ja potilaiden perheille, mikä tukee, ohjeistaa ja muistuttaa tärkeistä hoidon vaiheista. Saat sovellukseen esimerkiksi muistutuksia tärkeistä valmistautumisohjeista ennen toimenpidettä, esitietolomakkeen täytettäväksi ja koko hoitopolun kuvattuna, jotta olet aina tietoinen hoitoprosessin seuraavista vaiheista.
Sovellus kommunikoi automaattisesti siihen hoitoyksikköön, jossa potilas on hoidettavana, joten hoitohenkilökunta voi seurata hoitoprosessin etenemistä ja tarvittaessa ottaa sinuun yhteyttä.
TaysPolku antaa sinulle kaiken tiedon toimenpiteestä vaiheistettuna yksinkertaisella aikajanalla, jotta sinun on helppo seurata hoidon kannalta merkityksellisiä ohjeita. Aikajanalla näet kaikki tärkeimmät ohjeet ja luettuasi voit kuitata ne tehdyksi. Seuraamalla sovelluksen automaattisesti lähettämiä muistutuksia sen käyttö tulee sujumaan mainiosti!
Kiitos ja mukavia hetkiä sovelluksen parissa!

Analyze snoring, talking, sounds, and more. Track your night like never before!
Awake or deep, light sleep too, Track it all—it’s made for you.

→ High-quality sleep audio recordings.
→ Make every morning a data-rich start to a well-rested day!
→ Get useful in-depth analysis and a tailored sleep experience with Prime Sleep Recorder.

Have less stress and listen to your snoring symphony or sleep-talking highlights. 
See the charts every morning. App with unique features and technologies to analyze your sleep and  improve the quality of your rest.

INSIGHTFUL MORNINGS
Just one click and Prime Sleep Recorder will collects and evaluates data, providing you with valuable insights every morning when you wake up.

TECHNOLOGY
Prime Sleep Recorder optimizes microphone sensitivity, utilizing your phone's hardware for precise sleep analysis through AI, providing accurate and visualized sleep data.

SCIENCE
Snore detection is powered by Artificial Intelligence (A.I.) with the support of a new Apple machine-learning technology. By using a large number of snoring and sleeping samples from various users, we are able to deliver a precise sleep analysis tailored to each individual in statistics and in snoring detection. Your personalized evaluation is crafted based on the vast dataset, ensuring a unique and tailored experience for every user.

HIGHLIGHTS:
▷ PERSONAL SLEEP SYMPHONY RECORDING
▷ EASY TO USE
▷ HIGH TECH SNORING DETECTION
Accurate snoring detection based on A.I.
▷ ONE CLICK POSSIBILITY TO RECORD ONLY SNORING
▷ LIFESTYLE FACTORS, WAKE-UP MOOD, NOTES
Assign factors (alcohol, coffee, stress, etc.) to each night and the mood after waking up, or add your own notes.
▷ AUDIO VISUALIZATION DURING RECORDING OR PLAYING
▷ MEMORY SAVING SYSTEM ON YOUR PHONE
aac audio compression for the best ratio quality and size
▷ EASY SHARING OF YOUR SLEEP SYMPHONY WITH YOUR FRIENDS:
Your sleep stories are meant to be heard. Turn your sleep recordings into a social media sensation!
▷ CHART AND DATA OF NOISE IN THE ROOM DURING THE NIGHT
▷ ADJUSTABLE RECORDING SOUND SENSITIVITY:
For different sound conditions in your room (a quiet or loud environment)
▷ ACTIVATION DELAY
Starts monitoring after a preset period of time.

▷ BACKGROUND MODE:
Monitoring and alarm runs also in background mode. Use your smartphone as usual without limitation.
▷ APPLE HEALTH INTEGRATION
▷ iCLOUD SYNCHRONIZATION
Synchronization among your devices and between free and paid versions.
▷ EXPORTING OF HISTORY TO CSV FILE

OPTIONAL APP EXTRAS:
●  Smart Alarms
●  Stop Snoring
●  Sleepy Sounds
● … and more

Our team is constantly working on new improvements to enhance your experience.

KNOW YOUR SLEEP HABITS WITH APP DESIGNED FOR:
Insomnia Fighters: tailored solutions for those battling with insomnia or other difficulties falling asleep.
Sleep Talkers and Snorers: capture and analyze your sleep talk and snoring patterns.

Focused Minds: Ideal for individuals wanting to enhance concentration for work or study.

Noise-Prone Sleepers: Designed for those easily affected by environmental noise during sleep.
Students under Pressure: Support for students facing the stress of examinations and schoolwork.
Quality Sleep Seekers: Tailored features for individuals striving to improve overall sleep quality.
Prime Sleep Recorder is more than an app; it's your personalized sleep companion, providing insights for a diverse range of sleep needs.

Apu sinne missä sinäkin.

OmaPohde on Pohjois-Pohjanmaan hyvinvointialueella asuville suunnattu turvallinen asiointipalvelu. Siellä voit hoitaa sosiaali- ja terveysasioitasi kätevästi missä ikinä oletkin.

Sovelluksesta löydät Digitaalisen sote-keskuksen, jonka kautta voit asioida chat-kanavissa tai osallistua ennalta varatulle videovastaanotolle. 

Digitaalisen sote-keskuksen lisäksi OmaPohteessa voit kirjata ylös verenpaine- tai verensokerimittauksiasi sekä jättää yhteydenottopyyntöjä.  Voit asioida Pohteen palveluissa huollettavan alle 12-vuotiaan lapsesi puolesta tai puolesta-asioinnin valtuutuksella yli 18-vuotiaan henkilön puolesta. 

Asioit aina Pohteen ammattilaisen kanssa. Palvelukokonaisuutta kehitetään koko ajan ja uudet palvelut päivittyvät sovellukseen automaattisesti.

The most popular and innovative app of its kind, SnoreLab records, measures and tracks your snoring and helps you to discover effective ways to reduce it.

SnoreLab has monitored more than 50 million nights of sleep and has helped millions of people to better understand or even eliminate their snoring problem.

The app is very easy to use: simply set SnoreLab running next to your bed whilst you sleep. In the morning you will discover your Snore Score, exactly when and how loudly you snored, and listen to some highlights!

SnoreLab lets you log and track lifestyle factors and any snoring remedies so you can see how they impact your snoring.

SnoreLab is attracting endorsements from doctors, dentists and users alike. The app can be useful in medical consultations when investigating sleep disorders such as sleep apnea.

Are you a room shaker or a snorter? A buzz saw or a whistler? Or do you just purr like a kitten? Discover the truth with SnoreLab! What's your Snore Score?

'An ingenious app' - Mail Online

'Best Health App - Runner-up' - Best App Ever Awards 2014

FEATURES:
▷ Snore Detection: Identifies snoring using advanced algorithms.
▷ Snore Recording: Captures sound samples of your snoring throughout the night.
▷ Snore Score: Measures snoring intensity to help you track your snoring over time.
▷ Breathing Analysis: BreathFlow™, SnoreLab’s unique measure of breathing stability correlated with apnea severity, analyzes sound patterns to detect indicators of irregular breathing. 
▷ Breathing Rate: Tracks your respiratory rate and identifies possible breathing interruptions.
▷ Nightly Comparison: See how your snoring changes from night to night.
▷ Remedy Testing: Measure how snoring remedies or lifestyle changes affect your results.
▷ Lifestyle Impact Tracking: Understand how factors like alcohol influence your snoring.
▷ Apple Health Integration: Syncs sleep and body stats seamlessly with Apple Health.
▷ Sleep Stats & Trends: Records detailed sleep metrics for better insights.
▷ Full-Night Recording: Continuous snore recording for deeper analysis.
▷ Share Recordings: Email snore sound files easily.
▷ Expert Remedies: Explore tips and information about effective snoring solutions.
▷ Simple & Intuitive: Easy to set up and use every night.

AWARDS:
▷ Top 10 Medical app in 30 countries
▷ "What's Hot" medical app in 33 countries
▷ Featured in Lifehacker, The Sunday Times, The Guardian, Quantified Self and others

SnoreLab has an average rating of 4.7 stars from over 10,000 user reviews. Here is a selection of some of our favourite reviews:

"This app is wonderful in that not only does it work, but its ease of use. This is a simple, effective tool to better health."

"Excellent app. This helped me to reduce my snoring by applying some of the remedies listed. My wife and I thank you, especially my Wife!"

"Take it from an MD... This program works and is a very useful tool to share with your doctor."

"SnoreLab is the best sleep recorder I have tried. My snoring is down 40 plus percent in just two weeks."

Your subscription can be cancelled or managed via your iTunes account settings. Your subscription will automatically renew unless you turn off auto-renewal at least 24-hours before the end of the subscription period.

SnoreLab is not a medical device, nor is it intended to replace professional medical advice and/or diagnosis. SnoreLab is not intended to diagnose or treat sleep apnea or any illness/medical condition. Please consult with a licensed medical practitioner before making any decisions or taking any actions that may affect your health, safety and wellbeing. Do not disregard professional advice because of anything you have seen, heard or read in the app. Always consult with a healthcare professional if you have any questions or concerns about your snoring or general health.

North Savo Wellbeing Services County

The OmaSavo mobile application is part of the North Savo Wellbeing Services County’s digital service portfolio. With OmaSavo, you can connect with social and healthcare professionals regardless of your location.

OmaSavo serves all residents of North Savo. Digital services are equally and flexibly available to everyone, regardless of where they live. You can handle matters independently or interact with a professional.

In the chat, you can reach social and healthcare professionals without an appointment. You can also have a pre-scheduled video consultation with a professional. The range of services in OmaSavo is continuously being developed.

You can also handle matters on behalf of your child or another person. Acting on behalf of someone else requires a Suomi.fi authorization for family members over 12 years old and other individuals.

FreeStyle Libre 3 -sovellus on hyväksytty käyttöön FreeStyle Libre 3 -järjestelmän sensorien ja FreeStyle Libre Select -sensorien kanssa.

FreeStyle Libre -perheen uusin jäsen on jatkuvan glukoosinseurannan (CGM) kehittyneintä teknologiaa, ja se auttaa tehostamaan glukoosinseurantaa:

•  Glukoosisi reaaliajassa, milloin tahansa [1].

•  Saat ilmoituksen heti, kun glukoosisi on liian matala tai korkea. Valinnaiset hälytykset[2] auttavat sinua tietämään, milloin sinun on ryhdyttävä toimiin.

•  Reaaliaikaiset lukemat päivittyvät minuutin välein - 5 kertaa nopeammin kuin muissa jatkuvan glukoosinseurannan järjestelmissä (CGM)[3].

•  Saat yksityiskohtaisia raportteja, mukaan lukien ajastasi alueella, jotka auttavat paremmin ymmärtämään glukoosisi suuntia ja kehitysmalleja.

YHTEENSOPIVUUS
Voit käyttää FreeStyle Libre 3 -sovellusta vain FreeStyle Libre 3 -järjestelmän sensorien ja FreeStyle Libre Select -sensorin kanssa. Se ei ole yhteensopiva FreeStyle Libre- tai FreeStyle Libre 2 -tuoteperheen sensoreiden kanssa.
 
Yhteensopivuus voi vaihdella eri älypuhelimien ja käyttöjärjestelmien välillä. Lue lisää yhteensopivista älypuhelimista osoitteessa www.FreeStyleLibre.com.

TIETOA SOVELLUKSESTA
FreeStyle Libre 3 -sovellus on tarkoitettu glukoositasojen mittaamiseen diabetesta sairastavilta henkilöiltä, kun sitä käytetään FreeStyle Libre 3 -järjestelmän sensoreiden tai FreeStyle Libre Select -sensorin kanssa. Lisätietoa FreeStyle Libre 3 -sovelluksen käytöstä on käyttäjän ohjekirjassa.

Ota yhteyttä terveydenhuollon ammattilaiseen varmistaaksesi, soveltuuko tämä tuote sinulle, tai jos sinulla on kysymyksiä siitä, miten tätä tuotetta käytetään hoitopäätösten tekemiseen.

[1] Sensorin asettamisen jälkeen sitä voidaan käyttää glukoosin tarkistukseen 60 minuutin kuluttua. 
[2] Ilmoituksia vastaanotetaan vain, kun hälytykset on kytketty päälle ja sensori on [30 jalan tai 10 metrin] esteettömän etäisyyden päässä lukulaitteesta tai älypuhelimesta, jolla sensorin käyttö on aloitettu. Älypuhelimen asianmukaiset asetukset on otettava käyttöön hälytyksien ja ilmoituksien vastaanottamiseksi. Katso lisätietoja FreeStyle Libre 3 -käyttäjän ohjekirjasta. 
[3] Käyttäjän laitteessa on oltava internetyhteys, jotta glukoositiedot voidaan ladata automaattisesti LibreView-järjestelmään. 

The sensor housing, FreeStyle, Libre, and related brand marks are marks of Abbott. Other trademarks are the property of their respective owners.

Lisätietoa laillisista ilmoituksista ja käyttöehdoista on osoitteessa www.FreeStyleLibre.com

========

Jos FreeStyle Libre -tuotteessa ilmenee teknisiä tai asiakaspalveluun liittyviä ongelmia, ota suoraan yhteyttä FreeStyle Libren asiakaspalveluun.

ERA SmartCard -kortinlukijaohjelmistoa voidaan käyttää yhteensopivissa palveluissa terveydenhuollon toimikortilla kirjautumiseen ja sähköiseen allekirjoitukseen turvallisesti ja tehokkaasti. Lisäksi tarvitset toimikortinlukijan.

- Käyttäjän tunnistaminen palvelussa
- Sähköinen allekirjoitus palvelussa

Jos lemmikkisi sairastuu tai tapaturma sattuu, saat LemmikkiHelppi-sovelluksella asiantuntevan etäeläin­lääkärin avun ja korvausasiasi vireille vuoden jokaisena päivänä klo 7–23.

LemmikkiHelpissä pääset helposti keskustelemaan etäeläinlääkärin kanssa chattia ja videoyhteyttä hyödyntäen. Sovelluksesta näet lisäksi helposti LähiTapiolan eläinklinikkakumppanit yhteystietoineen ja aukioloaikoineen. Sovellus sisältää myös lemmikkisi vakuustiedot ja sitä näyttämällä vakuutusasiointi on entistäkin sujuvampaa LähiTapiolan kumppanieläinklinikoilla ja eläinsairaaloissa.

Saat LemmikkiHelpin heti käyttöösi kun sinulla on LähiTapiolan eläinlääkärikuluvakuutus. Sovelluksella voit valtuuttaa lemmikillesi myös muita hoitajia.

Palveluntarjoajat:
LemmikkiHelppi: Omaeläinklinikka Oy, Veteva Oy/LähiVet,
Eläinlääkärikuluvakuutus: LähiTapiolan alueyhtiöt.
Palvelu on osa LähiTapiolan korvauspalvelua.

Lataa Pihlajalinna-videovastaanotto puhelimeesi! Sovelluksella voit osallistua lääkärin videovastaanotolle. Videovastaanotto toimii ajanvarauksella.

Sovelluksen videovastaanotolla pääset keskustelemaan hoitohenkilökunnan ja lääkärien kanssa. Videovastaanotolla voidaan hoitaa monia asioita, jotka eivät vaadi fyysistä käyntiä lääkärikeskuksessa.

Näin lataat sovelluksen ja aloitat käytön
Aloita lataamalla sovellus ilmaiseksi sovelluskaupasta. Voit käyttää sovellusta heti. Osa toiminnoista vaatii tunnistautumisen pankkitunnuksilla.

Clinical Decision Support for Healthcare Professionals (NPI Required).

OpenEvidence is the world’s leading medical information platform for health care professionals, providing accurate and efficient answers at the point of care. Every answer on OpenEvidence is always sourced, cited, and grounded in the peer-reviewed medical literature.

Now featuring New England Journal of Medicine (NEJM) published content, NEJM multimedia content, and NEJM invited review articles authored by the world’s leading clinical experts.

• 160 medical specialties
• 1,000+ diseases and therapeutic areas
• 1m+ medical topics

Trusted by medical professionals at 10,000+ care centers across the United States.

OpenEvidence is only available for health care professionals. Users must verify their health care professional status before using OpenEvidence.

AS SEEN IN

Forbes: “OpenEvidence Keeps Doctors Up To Date On The Latest Science”

TESTIMONIALS

“OpenEvidence can be the foundational technology to power all clinical decision tools.” - Dr. Antonio Jorge Forte, MD. Director of MayoExpert, Mayo Clinic

“OpenEvidence is more up-to-date than UpToDate. And more useful regardless, since it’s interactive, and you can ask it questions, and get very specific answers about specific medical fact patterns in a patient case. It’s like having a curbside consult with a team of expert physicians, but that you can carry around with you in your pocket.” - Dr. Ram Dandillaya, MD. Clinical Chief, Department of Cardiology, Cedars-Sinai Medical Center

STAY SHARP & UP-TO-DATE

• Find what you need, when you need it on a mobile-native platform.

• The world’s most powerful medical search engine at your fingertips.

• Discover and find exactly what you are looking for with deep search and a highly intuitive user interface that understands you and what you are asking.

The new myPhonak comes with improved functionality and a new design to make your hearing experience as seamless and as tailored to your needs as possible. myPhonak provides you access to enhanced hearing controls and personalization options for your Phonak hearing aid(s) in addition to tracking your health data.*

The Remote Control enables you to easily make changes to your hearing aid(s) to suit your personal preferences for various listening situations. You can easily adjust the volume and various hearing aid features (e.g., noise reduction and microphone directionality) or select pre-defined programs according to the different listening situation you are in. Additionally, you can make quick adjustments to the pitch of the sound in the equalizer by using the presets (default, comfort, clarity, softer, etc.) or more personalized adjustments using the sliders (bass, middle, treble). 

The Remote Support allows you to meet with your hearing care professional through a live video call and have your hearing aids adjusted remotely. (by appointment) 

Numerous functions are available within the Health section such as Steps* and Wearing time*, including Optional goal setting*, Activity levels*, Heart rate tracking**, Distance walked and ran***. 

* Available on Paradise Rechargeable, Audéo Fit, Lumity and Infinio devices
** Available on Audéo Fit only
***Available on  Audéo Fit , Lumity and Infinio devices

Finally, myPhonak allows for configuration of Tap Control, setting up cleaning reminders and provides additional information, such as battery level and status of connected hearing aids and accessories. 

Hearing aid compatibility: 
myPhonak is compatible with Phonak hearing aids with Bluetooth® connectivity.  

myPhonak can be used with:
• Phonak Virto™ I (Infinio)
• Phonak Audéo™ I (Infinio)
• Phonak CROS™ I (Infinio)
• Phonak Sky™ L (Lumity)

• Phonak Terra™+

• Phonak Slim™ L (Lumity)
• Phonak Audéo™ L (Lumity) 
• Phonak Audéo Life™ (Lumity) 
• Phonak CROS™  P (Paradise)
• Phonak Audéo Fit™  (Paradise) 
• Phonak Audéo Life™ (Paradise) 
• Phonak Virto™ P-312 (Paradise) 
• Phonak Naída™ P (Paradise) 
• Phonak Audéo™ P (Paradise) 
• Phonak Audéo™ M (Marvel)

Device compatibility: 

iPhone 6s and newer running iOS Version 15.0 or newer. Phones with Bluetooth low energy (BT-LE) capability required. 
If you want to check if your smartphone is compatible, please visit our compatibility checker: https://www.phonak.com/en-int/support/compatibility

Please find the Instruction for Use on https://www.phonak.com/en-int/hearing-devices/apps/myphonak. 

IOS is a trademark of Cisco, Inc.
The Bluetooth® word mark and logos are registered trademarks owned by Bluetooth SIG, Inc. and any use of such marks by Sonova AG is under license.

Always seek the advice of a doctor in addition to using this app and before making any medical decisions.

The app is only available in countries where the compatible hearing instruments have received official approval for distribution.

myPhonak supports integration with Apple Health when connected to a compatible hearing aid such as Phonak Audéo Fit.
